QuestData.Title: Consecrating Ground
QuestData.Description: We have everything we need.$b$bIn the alcove below you will find the shattered remains of the Argunite Matrix. Replacing the Keystone will restore it to full capacity.$b$bThe pylons you activated will then be able to repel those who still hunt my people. At long last this battle will be over.$b$bI hope it brings them peace.
QuestData.LogDescription: Repair the Argunite Matrix beneath Triumvirate's End.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hurry $n, we cannot let this continue any longer.
